EmailTemplate.name: Fuelbook Select
EmailTemplate.subject: Fuelbook Select - Amazing Program Benefits
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello -
I am following-up in regards to some information that was recently sent to you about the new Fuelbook Select fuel card program powered by WEX Fleet One. This offer was sent to a select group of potential customers and allows you to be pre-approved for a credit line for fuel (based on how many trucks/vehicles you are currently running).<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
The Fuelbook Select fuel card program offers a discount at Pilot/Flying J as well as other additional benefits. Please reach out to me via email or phone if you would like to apply or if you have any questions/concerns.
Sincerely,
Joni Crockarell
Inside Sales Associate â€“ OTR
WEX Fleet One
